prompts: Create a ground-type Pokemon that resembles a small, furry creature with a unique ability.
Show me an insect-like Pokemon with vibrant colors and an unusual pattern on its wings.
Imagine a bug-type Pokemon that can camouflage itself in the forest, blending with leaves.
Design a mythical creature that has both grass and fairy elements, with a magical aura.
Generate a Pokemon that evolves from a small worm into a majestic butterfly with colorful wings.
Give me a water-type Pokemon that has a sleek design and can swim gracefully in the ocean.
Make a rock-type Pokemon with a rugged appearance and a powerful defense mechanism.

distinctive_features: Decorative leaf-like structures on its back
A metallic structure resembling a chimney on top
Red circular markings on its body
